title: [NZ] Lincoln University
body:
Anyone go to Lincoln Uni? add me ingame

d5 last season + challenger r5s but currently unranked/unpracticed

replies.body:
Hey iNT ICE PLT

Its awesome that you're interested in meeting other players in Lincoln University. We received an application in February from Lincoln University via the [Club Directory](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/uni-clubs/). However, when we reached out to find some more information we unfortunately heard nothing back. 

Have you thought about starting a LoL Club at Lincoln University?

Thanks
Conquisitor
I thought about it but first i'd want to find other people that play, so hopefully someone finds this post
I hope things work out. You might want to see if your student union can help you also
